revised_title: Anatomical and Functional Analysis of Descending Degenerations in the Brain and Spinal Cord
tldr: The study investigates the anatomical changes and functional effects of descending degenerations in the brain and spinal cord, particularly in absinthe epilepsy. The research focuses on various lesions and their impact on neural pathways, providing insights into the underlying mechanisms of epilepsy and the role of different brain regions in symptom manifestation.
